item.title: Report E-2024120208
item.description:
Report E-2024120208

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-13T00:52:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: HAMPSHIRE
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately five (5) gallons of material released from one (1) 5-gallon metal jerrican due to improperly handled freight that resulted in the jerrican being damaged. The material released was automotive primer. The release material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and gathered the spent material and containerized it into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
